title: NFL ATL: Championship Sunday recap
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Championship Sunday recap
description:
A room full of heroes -- Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus and Marc Sessler -- recap both of Sunday’s AFC and NFC Championship Games. Get the analysis and biggest takeaways from each matchup. The gang also sets you up for Super Bowl XLVIII between old-school quarterback Peyton Manning and new-school quarterback Russell Wilson. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
